description: A widget representing a numeric value as a horizontal bar with a growing indicator.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

minimum.description: The value that represents a progress of 0%.

maximum.description: The value that represents a progress of 100%.

tintColor.description: The color used to display the current progress.

selection.description: The actual progress to be displayed.

state.description: This property affects the color of the progress indicator. Not supported on iOS.
